/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the cityscape. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. The buildings, painted in shades of gray and brown, rise high into the sky, their architecture a testament to the city's modern design. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful contrast to the earthy tones below. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and gives a sense of scale to the scene.
